name: Boston
tagline: is a tool for exploring historic urban atlases in metropolitan Boston and telling stories about how places have changed over time
institutionalCredit: A project of the [Leventhal Map & Education Center at the Boston Public Library](https://www.leventhalmap.org)

properties.bibliographicEntry: Aerial imagery of Massachusetts from the 1990s, provided by [MassGIS](https://www.mass.gov/info-details/massgis-data-1990s-aerial-imagery)
Aerial imagery of Massachusetts from 2021, provided by [MassGIS](https://www.mass.gov/info-details/massgis-data-2021-aerial-imagery)
Aerial imagery of Massachusetts from 2023, provided by [MassGIS](https://www.mass.gov/info-details/massgis-data-2023-aerial-imagery)
Modern street map data, [© MapTiler](https://www.maptiler.com/copyright/) and [© OpenStreetMap contributors](https://www.openstreetmap.org/copyright)
